posts.title: My First Post: An Introduction
content: Welcome to my blog! This is where I'll be sharing my thoughts, personal projects, and insights on web development and design.

My goal is to create a useful space for both beginners and experienced developers to learn and grow. I'll cover topics from fundamental concepts to advanced techniques, with practical examples and code snippets.

posts.title: Learning Web Development: Where to Start?
content: Many people ask me where to begin their web development journey. My advice is always the same: start with the foundations. Don't rush into complex frameworks.
Focus on **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**. These three languages are the building blocks of the web. Once you have a solid grasp of these, you can explore libraries and frameworks like React or Vue.js.
